instruction: In this task, given a sentence in English Tokens, your task is to convert it into the English language
input: Stevens was convicted in October on seven felony counts of lying on senate disclosure forms about gifts , largely in the form of free renovations to his home , received from an oil service company ; his conviction is thought to have been a large factor in his November electoral defeat to former Anchorage mayor Mark Begich , the current junior Senator from Alaska .
output: Stevens was convicted in October on seven felony counts of lying on senate disclosure forms about gifts, largely in the form of free renovations to his home, received from an oil service company; his conviction is thought to have been a large factor in his November electoral defeat to former Anchorage mayor Mark Begich, the current junior Senator from Alaska.
